level.heading: Additional revenues.
level.text: All revenues from the following sources shall be deposited into the Fund:
Steam (including arrearage payments) for the Correctional Treatment Facility received by the District since October 1, 2007; and

Aggregate revenues in excess of $88 million received in any one fiscal year beginning on or after October 1, 2012, from fines paid due to automated photo enforcement; except, that in fiscal year 2014, it shall be in excess of $92.5 million.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-168, see notes under ยง 34-1802.
